Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
littlest \littlest\ adj. [superl. of {little}.] having or being distinguished by diminutive size.
Syn: least, smallest. [WordNet 1.5]
littlest adj : having or being distinguished by diminutive size; "the least bittern" [syn: {least}, {smallest}]
